thread.title: Police encouraged by Christchurch City Council decision (New Zealand Police)
thread.title_full: Police encouraged by Christchurch City Council decision (New Zealand Police) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Police encouraged by Christchurch City Council decision (New Zealand Police)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Police ) Canterbury Police are currently assessing how yesterday's decision by Christchurch City Council concerning windscreen washers can be used as part of the prevention activities currently undertaken by Police.
